item.title: Man climbs stage carrying machete, arrested in Raichur district
item.description:
<![CDATA[A man who was found carrying a machete on stage put up for Ram Navami celebrations in Lingsugur of Raichur district has been arrested by the police.
The man identified as Srinivas Pujari of Vandali village, a worker at Hutti Gold Mines, has been booked under the Arms Act.
He was seen hiding a machete in his clothes on stage from where expelled BJP leader Basanagouda Patil Yatnal was addressing a gathering.
